ns2:EnumDataTypeDefinition.ns1:desc: Indicates what timestamp format is used in the Result Output Period (ROP) filename.

ns2:member.name: local-with-utc-offset
ns2:member.ns2:desc: Filename timestamp expressed as ME local time with UTC offset. The Starttime and Endtime fields in the filename are expressed according to 3GPP TS 32.432, as ME local time with UTC offset. This is the recommended setting.

ns2:member.name: utc-no-offset
ns2:member.ns2:desc: Filename timestamp expressed as UTC time with no offset. The Starttime and Endtime fields in the filename are expressed as UTC time with no offset.
